paper_abstract: THE KREMLIN OPEN-SOURCE TOOL HELPS PROGRAMMERS BY AUTOMATICALLY IDENTIFYING REGIONS IN SEQUENTIAL PROGRAMS THAT MERIT PARALLELIZATION. KREMLIN COMBINES A NOVEL DYNAMIC PROGRAM ANALYSIS, HIERARCHICAL CRITICAL-PATH ANALYSIS, WITH MULTICORE PROCESSOR MODELS TO EVALUATE THOUSANDS OF POTENTIAL PARALLELIZATION STRATEGIES AND ESTIMATE THEIR PERFORMANCE OUTCOMES.
paper_title: THE KREMLIN ORACLE FOR SEQUENTIAL CODE PARALLELIZATION
